QuestData.Title: None Left Behind
QuestData.Description: Your friend has been doing everything she can to save my crew. I'm deeply appreciative.$B$BWe're still dealing with more than we can handle here: quenching the fires on the wreckage, getting my people out, fighting off these evil sea creatures, and trying to prevent the prisoners from escaping. We're simply in over our heads.$B$BI still have men on the ship that we need to get clear before the wreckage collapses on them. I know this is asking a lot, but can you help?
QuestData.RewardText: I have no idea who you people are, but fate surely smiled on us this day. Many more would be dead if not for the help of you and your friends. I am in your debt.
